item.title: World’s largest offshore wind farm maker Orsted takes fresh $1.7 billion write-down in the U.S. as its Trump nightmare begins
item.description: Orsted's latest impairment came on the same day Trump banned new offshore wind licenses.

item.title: A top 10 fund manager with $2 trillion in assets: Generali and Natixis to merge

item.description: Some federal departments have more than half their staff working remotely—meaning Trump's new executive order is a problem.
